article_title: Of mustaches and men: Obama adviser David Axelrod talks politics with David Maraniss in Madison

article_metadata.description: Axelrod engaged in a freewheeling discussion with the Pulitzer Prize-winning part-time Madisonian at an epilepsy benefit Thursday.
article_metadata.author: Rob Thomas
